title: BYOD battery bloodbath Facebook fesses up to crook code
text:
BYOD battery bloodbath? Facebook 'fesses up to crook code 
The Register Friday 23rd October, 2015 
If you've gone down the bring your own device (BYOD) route and your users are always complaining about battery life, Facebook has just explained why: its iOS app sucks ... ridiculous amounts of power. 
The Social Network(TM)'s engineering manager Ari Grant took to his own...
